analysis.description:
TokenToken.sell (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#648-670) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(tokenExchange.asset()).approve(address(tokenExchange),subTokensToSell) (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#663-664)

TokenToken.breakdown (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#670-688) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(tokenExchange.asset()).transfer(msg.sender,subTokensToSell) (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#684-687)

TokenToken.rebalance (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(fromExchange.asset()).approve(address(fromExchange),subTokensToSell) (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol)

ERC20.totalSupply.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#31) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (function @ /unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#30-31)

TokenTraderFactory.verify.owner (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#367) shadows:
	- Owned.owner (state variable @ /unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#42)

FixedSupplyToken.totalSupply.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#504-505) shadows:
	- FixedSupplyToken.totalSupply (function @ /unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#503-506)
	- ERC20.totalSupply (function @ /unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#30-31)

TokenToken.buyPrice has external calls inside a loop:
	- totalPrice += tokenExchanges[i].buyPrice() * tokenRatios[i] / 1e18 (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#629-630)

TokenToken.sellPrice has external calls inside a loop:
	- totalPrice += tokenExchanges[i].sellPrice() * tokenRatios[i] / 1e18 (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#634)

TokenToken.buy has external calls inside a loop:
	- tokenExchange.transfer(msg.value * tokenRatios[i] / 1e18) (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#640-641)

TokenToken.sell has external calls inside a loop:
	- subTokensToSell = ERC20(tokenExchange.asset()).balanceOf(this) * amount / tokensBought (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#662-663)

TokenToken.sell has external calls inside a loop:
	- revenue += subTokensToSell * tokenExchange.sellPrice() (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#663)

TokenToken.sell has external calls inside a loop:
	- ERC20(tokenExchange.asset()).approve(address(tokenExchange),subTokensToSell) (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#663-664)

TokenToken.sell has external calls inside a loop:
	- tokenExchange.takerSellAsset(subTokensToSell) (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#664-666)

TokenToken.breakdown has external calls inside a loop:
	- subTokensToSell = ERC20(tokenExchange.asset()).balanceOf(this) * amount / tokensBought (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#682-684)

TokenToken.breakdown has external calls inside a loop:
	- ERC20(tokenExchange.asset()).transfer(msg.sender,subTokensToSell) (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#684-687)

Reentrancy in TokenToken.buy (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#636-648):
	External calls:
	- amount = msg.value / buyPrice() (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#639)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#641-642)
	- balances (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#642-644)
	- tokensBought (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#641)

Reentrancy in TokenTraderFactory.createTradeContract (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#420-454):
	External calls:
	- allowance = ERC20(asset).allowance(msg.sender,this) (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#433-436)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _verify (/unique_contracts/0x8f3c45d637a9c2103d06f917aeeaff25eb7224c7.sol#449)
